News.Title: KHFM Hospitality and Facility Secures 50.3 Crore Rupee Order
News.Summary: KHFM Hospitality and Facility, a company with a market capitalization of 180 crore rupees, has won a new order worth 50.3 crore rupees. This represents a significant contract for the SME (Small and Medium Enterprise) company, potentially boosting its revenue and market position.
